snippet: "Open City," the winning novel by the U.S.-born, Nigeria-raised writer, is about a Nigerian studying psychiatry in New York who takes to wandering Manhattan and then the world after he breaks up with his girlfriend.
abstract: "Open City," the winning novel by the U.S.-born, Nigeria-raised writer, is about a Nigerian studying psychiatry in New York who takes to wandering Manhattan and then the world after he breaks up with his girlfriend.

headline.main: Hemingway/PEN Award Goes to Teju Cole
headline.print_headline: Writer at Bard Wins Hemingway/PEN Award
